snippet: Senator Cory Booker, Democrat of New Jersey, used the snowfall in Washington to take a playful jab at his ideological opposite, Senator Rand Paul, Republican of Kentucky.
abstract: Senator Cory Booker, Democrat of New Jersey, used the snowfall in Washington to take a playful jab at his ideological opposite, Senator Rand Paul, Republican of Kentucky.

headline.main: Snowball Fight. After School. Be There.
